practiceDescription: The table below shows the time to integrate for records received by the practice.
expanderFirstParagraph: When records are not integrated within 8 days, GP2GP requests that a full paper copy is printed and sent to the practice.
expanderSecondParagraph: This increases the burden on both the sending and receiving practices. Sending practices have to print and send the record.Receiving practices have to summarise the paper copy and find space to file it.
